tool.name: Variant_Pre_Processing_1
tool.description: GATK steps to get ready for variant calling. Part 1 of 3.
tool.command: echo -n "Picard SortSam"; java -jar {PicardMaster} SortSam --version -Djava.io.tmpdir=$TMPDIR -Xmx4g -jar {PicardMaster} SortSam SO=coordinate INPUT={in_1} OUTPUT={Sorted} VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=SILENT CREATE_INDEX=true

echo -n "Picard MarkDuplicates "; java -jar {PicardMaster} MarkDuplicates --version -Djava.io.tmpdir=$TMPDIR -Xmx4g -jar {PicardMaster} MarkDuplicates I={Sorted} O={out_1} M={out_2} REMOVE_DUPLICATES=true CREATE_INDEX=true VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=SILENT
